name: Paragraph 78
description:
Paragraph 78 is an action-shooter game developed by Gaijin Entertainment. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by 1C Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Paragraph 78 on PC.
Yusup Bahshiev produced the game. Mikhail Khleborodov directed the game. Tobias Enhus scored the game.
